revision.comment: /* Semi-protected edit request on 6 April 2016 */ Responded to edit request ([[WP:EPH|EPH]])
revision.text: {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Film|American-task-force=yes|Animated=yes|animated-importance=low|class=Start}} {{WikiProject Animation|class=Start|importance=low|film=yes|film-importance=low}} {{WikiProject Dogs|class=start|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Animals in media|class=Start|importance=Mid}} }} =Balto's Voice= ==Untitled== Who did Balto's voice in this movie? [[Kevin Bacon]] or [[Maurice LaMarche]]? ==Image copyright problem with Image:Balto in wings of change.JPG== The image [[:Image:Balto in wings of change.JPG]] is used in this article under a claim of [[WP:NFC|fair use]], but it does not have an adequate explanation for why it meets the [[WP:NFCC|requirements for such images]] when used here. In particular, for each page the image is used on, it must have an [[Wikipedia:Non-free use rationale guideline|explanation]] linking to that page which explains why it needs to be used on that page. Please check :* That there is a [[Wikipedia:Non-free use rationale guideline|non-free use rationale]] on the image's description page for the use in this article. :* That this article is linked to from the image description page. This is an automated notice by [[User:FairuseBot|FairuseBot]]. For assistance on the image use policy, see [[Wikipedia:Media copyright questions]]. --15:00, 12 May 2008 (UTC) ==This is NOT NPOV== "It is considered to be superior to the first sequel, ''[[Balto II: Wolf Quest]]''." This kind of statement is not acceptable in an encyclopedia with a neutral point of view on all subject matter. Unless someone can cite references proving everyone considers it better than Wolf Quest it shall remain deleted. [[Special:Contributions/72.152.135.75|72.152.135.75]] ([[User talk:72.152.135.75|talk]]) 03:16, 31 May 2008 (UTC) == Semi-protected edit request on 6 April 2016 == {{edit semi-protected|Balto III: Wings of Change|answered=yes}} Category:Universal Studios franchises [[Special:Contributions/76.88.107.122|76.88.107.122]] ([[User talk:76.88.107.122|talk]]) 02:44, 6 April 2016 (UTC) :[[File:Yes check.svg|20px|link=]] '''Done''' [[User:EvergreenFir|'''EvergreenFir''']] [[User talk:EvergreenFir|(talk)]] Please {{[[Template:re|re]]}} 18:03, 8 April 2016 (UTC)
